sentences.en: A lighthouse marks the entrance to the harbour.
sentences.cn: 灯塔是进入海港航道的标志。

sentences.en: The lighthouse stood out starkly against the dark sky.
sentences.cn: 在黑暗的天空映衬下，灯塔巍然兀立。

sentences.en: The lighthouse beam was quite distinct in the gathering dusk.
sentences.cn: 灯塔的光柱在渐暗的黄昏中相当清楚。
